resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75948</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75948</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>07e281bd-6e2f-4ea1-9710-992fdab8b75b#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A Nap</string>
            <string language="en">The Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ήλιος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Sol</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Föld légkörét négyzetméterenként s másodpercenként 1400 J energiával árasztja el a Nap.</string>
            <string language="en">The atmosphere of the earth is flooded on one squaremeter and in one second with 1400 J energy by the sun. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Nap,  energia,  energia áram,  hősugárzás,  </string>
            <string language="en">Sun,  energy,  energy stream,  heat radiation,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Atmosphäre der Masse wird auf einem 
squaremeter und in einer Sekunde mit J Energie 1400 durch die Sonne 
überschwemmt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'atmosphère de la terre est inondée sur un 
squaremeter et dans une seconde avec de l'énergie 1400 de J par le 
soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A atmosfera da terra é inundada em um squaremeter
e em um segundo com a energia 1400 de J pelo sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'atmosfera della terra è sommerso su uno 
squaremeter ed in un secondo da energia 1400 di J dal sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Την ατμόσφαιρα της γης σε ένα squaremeter και σε ένα
δευτερόλεπτο με την ενέργεια 1400 j από ο ήλιος 
πλημμυρίζει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La atmósfera de la tierra es inundada en un 
squaremeter y en un segundo con la energía 1400 de J por el sol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne, Energie, Energiestrom, Hitzestrahlung,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le soleil, énergie, jet d'énergie, rayonnement thermique,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sol, energia, córrego da energia, radiação de calor,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sole, energia, flusso di energia, radiazione di calore,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήλιος, ενέργεια, ενεργειακό ρεύμα, ακτινοβολία θερμότητας,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sol, energía, secuencia de la energía, radiación térmica,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75948</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=07e281bd-6e2f-4ea1-9710-992fdab8b75b&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
